tokens.resolved_gloss: properly, assemblage; used only adverbially also, even, yea, though; often repeated as correl. both...and

tokens.resolved_gloss: properly, to be rubbed or worn; hence (figuratively) to be weak, sick, afflicted; or (causatively) to grieve, make sick; also to stroke (in flattering), entreat
tokens.translation: properly, to be rubbed or worn; hence (figuratively) to be weak, sick, afflicted; or (causatively) to grieve, make sick; also to stroke (in flattering), entreat

tokens.resolved_gloss: to stun (or intransitively, grow numb), i.e. devastate or (figuratively) stupefy (both usually in a passive sense)
